member.summary: Describes the possible types of vertical alignments.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadVerticalAlignment.Bottom
member.summary: Specifies that the text should align with the bottom edge of the cell.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadVerticalAlignment.Center
member.summary: Specifies that the text should be centered across the height of the cell.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadVerticalAlignment.Top
member.summary: Specifies that the text should align with the top edge of the cell.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadVerticalAlignment.Justify
member.summary: Specifies that the text should be justified across the height of the cell.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadVerticalAlignment.Distributed
member.summary: Specifies that the text should be evenly distributed across the height of the cell.

member.name: T:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadHorizontalAlignment
member.summary: Describes the possible types of horizontal alignments.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadHorizontalAlignment.General
member.summary: General horizontal alignment. Text data is left-aligned. Numbers, dates, and times are right-aligned. Boolean types are centered. Changing the alignment does not change the type of data.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadHorizontalAlignment.Left
member.summary: Specifies that the text should align with the left edge of the cell.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadHorizontalAlignment.Center
member.summary: Specifies that the text should be centered across the cell.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadHorizontalAlignment.Right
member.summary: Specifies that the text should align with the right edge of the cell.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadHorizontalAlignment.Justify
member.summary: Specifies that the text should be justified between the left and right edges of the cell except the last line.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadHorizontalAlignment.Fill
member.summary: Specifies that the value of the cell should be filled across the entire width of the cell.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadHorizontalAlignment.CenterContinuous
member.summary: Specifies that the text should be centered across multiple cells.

member.name: F:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadHorizontalAlignment.Distributed
member.summary: Specifies that the text should be evenly distributed between the left and right edges of the cell.
